There, I fixed the internet.

This was formerly hosted by a Unity staffer on Google drive (who knows why???) - I got my hands on a copy, made a test KSPpedia page to make sure I could, and stuffed it into the IA for safe keeping.

Am I allowed? IDGA[redacted]!
